title: Biodiversity Data Management
text:
Welcome
The objective of this five-day training course, co-organized by the FRB-CESAB, the PNDB, and GBIF France is to train researchers in the different aspects of the data life cycle: acquisition, management, archiving, writing data paper and metadata. This training course focuses on biodiversity and environmental data.

title: Biodiversity Data Management
text:
Prerequisites
  Please follow this tutorial to install your working environment before attending the training course.
  You also need to create an account on GitHub (please edit your profile and enter your name).

title: Biodiversity Data Management
text:
Material
All the material used in this training course (slides, data, exercises) is available at: https://github.com/biodiversitydata/
